submission:
class Solution(object):
    def minimumOperations(self, nums, target):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type target: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        length = len(nums)
        diffList = [target[x] - nums[x] for x in range(length)]

        print(diffList)
        count = 0
        temp = 0
        pos = True
        zero = False
        last = 0
        subtract = 0
        for x in diffList:
            if x == 0 and not zero:
                count += temp
                pos = not pos
                zero = True
                temp = 0
                last = 0            

            if (x < 0 and pos) or (x > 0 and not pos):
                count += temp
                pos = not pos
                temp = abs(x)
                zero = False
            else:
                if last > abs(x):
                    count += temp
                    subtract += abs(x)
                    temp = 0
                
                temp = max(temp, abs(x))
                zero = False
            last = abs(x)
                   
        count += temp - subtract
        return count
